title: nIyanri yAr tuNai
sahitya:
(rAgA:  madhyamAvati)   
  nIyanri yAr tuNai nikhilANDa shakti


nIyanri yAr tuNai.  rAgamAlikA.  rUpaka tALA.  
P:  nIyanri yAr tuNai nikhilANDa shakti
A:  tAi izhanda sEyaip-pOlE tavittiDum enakkirangi vAyinAl inidu sholli manak-kavalai tIrttaruLa
kalyANI karuNAmbikE kAtyAyani mahAdEvi ellAmum valla tAyE Ezhai pangALi kALi kALI
kAnaDarnda kariruLil kaDum puli piDunguginra mAn ena immAyak-kUTTil mayangit-tiyangumadalai vAzha
bhayandODip-parivu tEDip-pAda malaraip-paTRik-koNDEn
nayandOriDar naliyak-kANbAi nArAyaNi abhayam abhayam
ArabhimAnamum vENDEn ammA unadanbE pOdum
pArabhimAnamum kaittadun padattilE abhimAnam vaittEn
yadukulam gOttiram enrillai Eka bhOga veLLamAgap-
podu nilaiyil eppOdum aruLum bhuvanEshvari nava saundari
mOhanAngi muttu gauri mUla vanni bAlAmbikE
yOga bhOga saubhAgya lakSmi Om parAshakti Om parAshakti
tajjham takahjam taLAngu tarikiTa dhimikiTa takkattA
tattarikiTa takajhaNu takajhaNu taLAngu tarikiTa tA 
tAkiTa takadhIm dhinna tOm tOm tOm tOm
